bibl.title: Dating Coptic Footwear: A Typological and Comparative Approach.
bibl.note: Abstract. - Background. - The material. - Terminology and methodology. - Results: constructional typology. - Results: decorative typology. - Results: comparative material. - Dating with the shoe form. - Dating with the slipper form. - Dating with decorative aspects. - Dating with comparative material. - Limitations. - Conclusion.
bibl.seg: Ruiha Smalley, Dating Coptic Footwear: A Typological and Comparative Approach.
